definition: face/side/surface/aspect/top/classifier for flat surfaces such as drums, mirrors, flags etc
band/belt/girdle/ribbon/tire/area/zone/region/CL:條|条[tiao2]/to wear/to carry/to take along/to bear (i.e. to have)/to lead/to bring/to look after/to raise
with a sad air/looking melancholy/with a worried look

sentences.english: We all smiled. The Cold War seemed a long time ago.
sentences.chinese: 我們都面帶微笑，冷戰似乎已經過去好久了。

sentences.english: He was sitting on the grass, very peaceful, smiling.
sentences.chinese: 他端坐在玻璃座上，非常安詳，面帶微笑。

sentences.english: But Hingis, smiling most of the way, showed who’s No. 1 on the court.
sentences.chinese: 而辛吉斯，始終面帶微笑，在球場上證明着誰是王者。

sentences.english: 'God bless me, ' he says with a smile.
sentences.chinese: 他面帶笑容地說道，“上帝很眷顧我。”

sentences.english: Grampy was waiting patiently. He smiled.
sentences.chinese: 祖父正耐心地等待着，並面帶微笑。

sentences.english: Maya is very busy, never wondering around, always wearing a blast on her face.
sentences.chinese: 每次想到丫丫面帶微笑忙這忙那都感覺很幸福。

sentences.english: A smiling Mickle is the best.
sentences.chinese: 面帶笑容的很多的是最好的。

sentences.english: " She looked at me in horror. "Are you crazy?
sentences.chinese: 可是她卻面帶驚恐地看着我，“你瘋了嗎？”
有位面帶微笑的六十歲公衆人物。
我面帶微笑，因爲我關心。

sentences.english: When you recall the past, is there some smile on your face or not.
sentences.chinese: 回憶往事的時候，你究竟是面帶微笑還是滿臉愁容？

sentences.english: Help guest to seat with smile and pleasant voice;
sentences.chinese: 爲客人拉椅讓座須面帶微笑，並伴隨令人愉悅的聲音。

sentences.english: It's the kind of movie that can make you laugh with tears in your eyes.
sentences.chinese: 它是那種能夠使你面帶笑容卻又熱淚盈眶的影片。

sentences.english: He simply stared at her fixedly with that peculiar expression on his face.
sentences.chinese: 他僅僅是面帶這種神情死死地盯着德拉。

sentences.english: He simply stared at her with that strange expression on his face.
sentences.chinese: 他僅僅是面帶這種神情死死地盯着德拉。

sentences.english: You should always keep smiling, being polite when you talk with the interviewer.
sentences.chinese: 與面試官交談時，你應彬彬有禮，始終面帶微笑。
